text:
:mega: As if this wasn't exciting enough... we want YOU to speak at Extend()!

We've opened a call for submissions for *community lightning talks*! Get in front of the HubSpot developer community with your coolest HubSpot hacks and builds!

We're especially excited to feature folks that haven't presented to our community before.

All details are <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Developer-Announcements/HubSpot-Extend-Call-for-Speakers/td-p/678084|here>, and you can go ahead and submit your idea <https://forms.gle/mygk8KvB33WrPsy69|here>!

But hurry... you only have until *August 19th* to submit your ideas.
